English text: Adjust a previous return
Welsh text: Addasu Datganiad blaenorol

English text: Declare adjustments from earlier returns
Welsh text: Datgan addasiadau o Ddatganiadau cynharach

English text: You must tell us about changes from earlier returns including:
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i chi roi gwybod i ni am newidiadau o Ddatganiadau cynharach, gan gynnwys:

English text: under-declared alcoholic products
Welsh text: cynhyrchion alcoholaidd a danddatganwyd

English text: over-declared alcoholic products
Welsh text: cynhyrchion alcoholaidd a orddatganwyd

English text: You may be required to explain why these were under or over-declared.
Welsh text: Efallai y bydd angen i chi egluro pam cafodd y rhain eu tanddatgan neu eu gorddatgan.

English text: You can also tell us about alcoholic products declared in earlier returns that have then:
Welsh text: Gallwch hefyd roi gwybod i ni am gynhyrchion alcoholaidd a ddatganwyd mewn Datganiadau cynharach, ac sydd – ers hynny – wedi:

English text: become spoilt and no longer fit to be consumed
Welsh text: cael eu difetha, ac nad ydynt felly’n addas i’w bwyta/yfed mwyach

English text: been repackaged and are no longer eligible for a reduced rate (draught relief)
Welsh text: cael eu hailbecynnu, ac nad ydynt yn gymwys mwyach ar gyfer cyfradd is (Rhyddhad ar Gynhyrchion o’r Gasgen)

English text: been exported
Welsh text: cael eu hallforio

English text: Do you have adjustments to declare?
Welsh text: A oes gennych addasiadau i’w datgan?

English text: Yes
Welsh text: Iawn

English text: No
Welsh text: Na

English text: Save and continue
Welsh text: Cadw a pharhau

English text: Select yes if you have adjustments to declare
Welsh text: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ os oes gennych addasiadau i’w datgan

English text: What type of adjustment are you declaring?
Welsh text: Pa fath o addasiad rydych chi’n ei ddatgan?

English text: Spoilt
Welsh text: Alcohol wedi’i ddifetha

English text: You have paid duty on alcohol and it is now spoilt and cannot be consumed.
Welsh text: Rydych chi wedi talu toll ar alcohol ac mae bellach wedi’i ddifetha ac ni ellir ei fwyta/yfed.

English text: Under-declaration
Welsh text: Tanddatganiad

English text: You under-declared alcohol on a previous return and have not paid enough duty.
Welsh text: Gwnaethoch chi danddatgan alcohol ar Ddatganiad blaenorol ac nid ydych chi wedi talu digon o doll.

English text: Over-declaration
Welsh text: Gorddatganiad

English text: You over-declared alcohol on a previous return and paid too much duty.
Welsh text: Gwnaethoch chi orddatgan alcohol ar Ddatganiad blaenorol a thalu gormod o doll.

English text: Repackaged draught products
Welsh text: Cynhyrchion o’r gasgen wedi’u hailbecynnu

English text: You have paid duty on alcohol at the reduced rate (draught relief) and have now repackaged it so it is no longer eligible for the reduced rate.
Welsh text: Rydych chi wedi talu toll ar alcohol ar y gyfradd is (Rhyddhad ar Gynhyrchion o’r Gasgen) ac rydych chi bellach wedi’i ailbecynnu, felly nid yw’n gymwys mwyach ar gyfer y gyfradd is.

English text: Drawback
Welsh text: Ad-daliad

English text: You exported alcohol you already paid duty on in an earlier return. You need an approved 'notice of intention to claim drawback' (NOI) before you tell us about it.
Welsh text: Gwnaethoch chi allforio alcohol roeddech chi eisoes wedi talu toll arno mewn Datganiad cynharach. Mae angen arnoch ‘hysbysiad o fwriad i hawlio ad-daliad’ cymeradwy, cyn i chi roi gwybod i ni amdano.

English text: Select the type of adjustment
Welsh text: Dewiswch y math o addasiad

English text: Which alcoholic product is spoilt?
Welsh text: Pa gynnyrch alcoholaidd sydd wedi’i ddifetha?

English text: Choose a type of alcoholic product to declare. You will be able to declare others afterwards.
Welsh text: Dewiswch fath o gynnyrch alcoholaidd i’w ddatgan. Byddwch chi’n gallu datgan cynhyrchion eraill wedyn.

English text: Beer
Welsh text: Cwrw

English text: Cider
Welsh text: Seidr

English text: Wine
Welsh text: Gwin

English text: Spirits
Welsh text: Gwirodydd

English text: Other fermented products
Welsh text: Cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill

English text: Select the type of alcoholic product you are declaring spoilt
Welsh text: Dewiswch y math o gynnyrch alcoholaidd rydych chi’n datgan ei fod wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Adjust for spoilt alcohol
Welsh text: Addasu ar gyfer alcohol wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Tell us about your spoilt beer
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich cwrw wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Total litres of spoilt beer
Welsh text: Cyfanswm y litrau o gwrw wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Tell us about your spoilt cider
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich seidr wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Total litres of spoilt cider
Welsh text: Cyfanswm y litrau o seidr wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Tell us about your spoilt wine
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich gwin wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Total litres of spoilt wine
Welsh text: Cyfanswm y litrau o win wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Tell us about your spoilt spirits
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich gwirodydd wedi’u difetha

English text: Total litres of spoilt spirits
Welsh text: Cyfanswm y litrau o wirodydd wedi’u difetha

English text: Tell us about your spoilt other fermented products
Welsh text: Rhoi gwybod i ni am eich cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill wedi’u difetha

English text: Total litres of spoilt other fermented products
Welsh text: Cyfanswm y litrau o gynhyrchion eplesedig eraill wedi’u difetha

English text: To 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Dylid nodi 2 le degol

English text: Litres of pure alcohol
Welsh text: Litrau o alcohol pur

English text: To 4 decimal places
Welsh text: Dylid nodi 4 lle degol

English text: How much duty was paid?
Welsh text: Faint o doll a dalwyd?

English text: Include pounds and pence
Welsh text: Dylech gynnwys punnoedd a cheiniogau

English text: Enter the total litres of spoilt [beer]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau o [gwrw] wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Enter the litres of pure alcohol in spoilt [beer]
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [cwrw] wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Litres of spoilt [beer] must be more than 0.00
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [gwrw] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn fwy na 0.00

English text: Litres of spoilt [beer] must be less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [gwrw] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Litres of spoilt [beer] must be a number to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [gwrw] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total litres of spoilt [cider]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau o [seidr] wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Enter the litres of pure alcohol in spoilt [cider]
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [seidr] wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Litres of spoilt [cider] must be more than 0.00
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [seidr] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn fwy na 0.00

English text: Litres of spoilt [cider] must be less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [seidr] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Litres of spoilt [cider] must be a number to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [seidr] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total litres of spoilt [wine]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau o [win] wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Enter the litres of pure alcohol in spoilt [wine]
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [gwin] wedi’i ddifetha

English text: Litres of spoilt [wine] must be more than 0.00
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [win] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn fwy na 0.00

English text: Litres of spoilt [wine] must be less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [win] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Litres of spoilt [wine] must be a number to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [win] wedi’i ddifetha fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total litres of spoilt [spirits]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau o [wirodydd] wedi’u difetha

English text: Enter the litres of pure alcohol in spoilt [spirits]
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [gwirodydd] wedi’u difetha

English text: Litres of spoilt [spirits] must be more than 0.00
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [wirodydd] wedi’u difetha fod yn fwy na 0.00

English text: Litres of spoilt [spirits] must be less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [wirodydd] wedi’u difetha fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Litres of spoilt [spirits] must be a number to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [wirodydd] wedi’u difetha fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 2 le degol

English text: Enter the total litres of spoilt [other fermented products]
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau o [gynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] wedi’u difetha

English text: Enter the litres of pure alcohol in spoilt [other fermented products]
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [cynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] wedi’u difetha

Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [gynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] wedi’u difetha fod yn fwy na 0.00

English text: Litres of spoilt [other fermented products] must be less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [gynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] wedi’u difetha fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Litres of spoilt [other fermented products] must be a number to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o [gynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] wedi’u difetha fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 2 le degol

English text: Enter the litres of pure alcohol in spoilt [beer]
Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [cwrw] wedi’i ddifetha

Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [seidr] wedi’i ddifetha

Welsh text: Nodwch y litrau o alcohol pur sydd yn y [gwin] wedi’i ddifetha

Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau o [gynhyrchion eplesedig eraill] wedi’u difetha

English text: Litres of pure alcohol must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yn rhif

English text: Litres of pure alcohol must be less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Litres of pure alcohol must be more than 0.0000
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yn fwy na 0.0000

English text: Litres of pure alcohol must be a number up to 4 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 4 lle degol
Comments: Thanks for the call, Del. As discussed, I've translated "to 4" instead of "up to 4" for this row, because it deals with Litres of pure alcohol.

English text: Litres of pure alcohol must be the same or less than the litres of [beer]
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yr un peth â’r litrau o [gwrw] neu’n llai na hynny

English text: Litres of pure alcohol must be the same or less than the litres of [cider]
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yr un peth â’r litrau o [seidr] neu’n llai na hynny

Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yr un peth â’r litrau o [win] neu’n llai na hynny

English text: Enter the amount of duty paid
Welsh text: Nodwch swm y doll a dalwyd

English text: The amount of duty paid must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i swm y doll a dalwyd fod yn rhif

Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i swm y doll a dalwyd fod yn llai na £100 biliwn

Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i swm y doll a dalwyd fod yn fwy na £0.00

English text: The amount of duty paid must include pounds and pence
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i swm y doll a dalwyd gynnwys punnoedd a cheiniogau

English text: Adjust for under-declared alcohol
Welsh text: Addasu ar gyfer alcohol a danddatganwyd

English text: Adjust for over-declared alcohol
Welsh text: Addasu ar gyfer alcohol a orddatganwyd

English text: Adjust for repackaged draught products
Welsh text: Addasu ar gyfer cynhyrchion o’r gasgen wedi’u hailbecynnu

English text: Adjust for duty drawback
Welsh text: Addasu ar gyfer ad-dalu toll

English text: When should you have paid duty?
Welsh text: Pryd dylech chi fod wedi talu toll?

English text: When did you pay duty on this?
Welsh text: Pryd gwnaethoch chi dalu toll ar hyn?

English text: Call or contact HMRC by post (opens in new tab) if this was originally declared before August 2023.
Welsh text: Ffoniwch CThEF neu cysylltwch â CThEF drwy’r post (yn agor tab newydd) os cyhoeddwyd hyn yn wreiddiol cyn mis Awst 2023.
Comments: Please let us know what URL will be used in the English version, and we can provide the equivalent Welsh URL. Thank you!

English text: For example, 10 2024
Welsh text: Er enghraifft, 10 2024

English text: Month
Welsh text: Mis

English text: Year
Welsh text: Blwyddyn

English text: Enter the date you paid duty
Welsh text: Nodwch y dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll

English text: The date you paid duty must include a month
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll gynnwys mis

English text: The date you paid duty must include a year
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll gynnwys blwyddyn

English text: Year must include 4 numbers
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r flwyddyn gynnwys 4 rhif

English text: The date you paid duty must be a real date using numbers
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll fod yn ddyddiad go iawn gan ddefnyddio rhifau

English text: The date you paid duty must use numbers
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll ddefnyddio rhifau

English text: The date you paid duty must be in the past
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll fod yn y gorffennol

English text: The date you paid duty must be after July 2023
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r dyddiad y gwnaethoch dalu toll fod ar ôl mis Gorffennaf 2023

English text: What is the tax type code for the alcohol you are adjusting?
Welsh text: Beth yw cod y math o dreth ar gyfer yr alcohol rydych chi’n ei addasu?

English text: The 3 digit tax type code for the under-declared alcohol
Welsh text: Cod 3 digid y math o dreth ar gyfer yr alcohol a danddatganwyd

English text: What is the tax type code for the newly repackaged products?
Welsh text: Beth yw cod y math o dreth ar gyfer y cynhyrchion sydd newydd gael eu hailbecynnu?

English text: A non-draught 3 digit tax type code
Welsh text: Cod 3 digid y math o dreth ar gyfer cynnyrch nad yw’n dod o’r gasgen

English text: Enter the tax type code
Welsh text: Nodwch god y math o dreth

English text: Enter a valid tax type code
Welsh text: Nodwch god dilys ar gyfer y math o dreth

English text: What is the tax type code for the alcohol you are repackaging?
Welsh text: Beth yw cod y math o dreth ar gyfer yr alcohol rydych chi’n ei ailbecynnu?

Welsh text: Cod 3 digid y math o dreth ar gyfer yr alcohol a danddatganwyd

Welsh text: Beth yw cod y math o dreth ar gyfer y cynhyrchion sydd newydd gael eu hailbecynnu?

English text: Litres of pure alcohol
Welsh text: Litrau o alcohol pur

English text: Enter the total litres
Welsh text: Nodwch gyfanswm y litrau

English text: Total litres must be a number
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm y litrau fod yn rhif

English text: Total litres must be a less than 1 billion
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm y litrau fod yn llai nag 1 biliwn

English text: Total litres must be more than 0.00
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm y litrau fod yn fwy na 0.00

English text: Total litres must be a number to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm y litrau fod yn rhif sy’n cynnwys 2 le degol

English text: Total litres must be the same or more that the litres of pure alcohol
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i gyfanswm y litrau fod yr un peth â’r litrau o alcohol pur neu’n fwy na hynny

Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’r litrau o alcohol pur fod yn rhif

Welsh text: Nodwch eich cyfradd doll yn sgil Rhyddhad i Gynhyrchwyr Bach

Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’ch cyfradd doll yn Sgil Rhyddhad i Gynhyrchwyr Bach fod yn rhif

English text: Your Small Producer Relief duty rate must be to 2 decimal places
Welsh text: Mae’n rhaid i’ch cyfradd doll yn sgil Rhyddhad i Gynhyrchwyr Bach gynnwys 2 le degol

English text: The duty value for this adjustment is £123,456.78
Welsh text: Gwerth y doll ar gyfer yr addasiad hwn yw £123,456.78

English text: This is because:
Welsh text: Mae hyn oherwydd y canlynol:

English text: you declared 1,234 litres of pure alcohol (LPA)
Welsh text: gwnaethoch ddatgan 1,234 litr o alcohol pur (LPA)

English text: the duty rate is £12.34 per litre of pure alcohol
Welsh text: y gyfradd doll yw £12.34 fesul litr o alcohol pur

English text: the duty is £123,456.78 (duty rate multiplied by the litres of pure alcohol)
Welsh text: y doll yw £123,456.78 (y gyfradd doll wedi’i lluosi â’r litrau o alcohol pur)

English text: Continue
Welsh text: Parhau

English text: The duty value for this adjustment is £123,456.78
Welsh text: Gwerth y doll ar gyfer yr addasiad hwn yw £123,456.78

English text: This is because:
Welsh text: Mae hyn oherwydd y canlynol:

English text: the reduced duty rate was £1.23 per litre of pure alcohol
Welsh text: y gyfradd doll is oedd £1.23 fesul litr o alcohol pur

English text: you declared 1,234 litres of pure alcohol (LPA)
Welsh text: gwnaethoch ddatgan 1,234 litr o alcohol pur (LPA)

English text: you originally paid £1,234.56
Welsh text: yn wreiddiol gwnaethoch chi dalu £1,234.56

English text: repackaged draught products are not eligible for reduced rates
Welsh text: nid yw cynhyrchion o’r gasgen wedi’u hailbecynnu yn gymwys ar gyfer cyfraddau is

English text: the standard duty rate is £1.23 per litre of pure alcohol
Welsh text: y gyfradd doll safonol yw £1.23 fesul litr o alcohol pur

English text: the new duty value at the standard duty rate is £1,234.56
Welsh text: gwerth newydd y doll ar y gyfradd doll safonol yw £1,234.56

English text: the duty to pay is £123,456.78: the new duty value minus the old duty value
Welsh text: y doll i’w thalu yw £123,456.78: hynny yw, gwerth newydd y doll llai hen werth y doll

English text: The adjustment and its information will be removed from your return.

Welsh text: Dewiswch ‘Iawn’ er mwyn tynnu’r addasiad hwn
